hero.2: On Germany's very first Exchange for Crypto

pricecomparison.2: We offer the best rates worldwide. Since we believe deeply in the importance of openness and trust, we show you the real time prices of other global exchanges, allowing you to obtain your own picture of the state of the market.

subscription.2: Enter your email to receive updates about Tauschkrypto
subscription.4: Almost finished... We need to confirm your email address. To complete the subscription process, please click the link in the email we just sent you.
subscription.5: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

faq.ques4: How long does the exchange process take?
faq.ques6: Do you collect any private information?
faq.ques8: How do I track my order?
faq.ques9: I see a 15-minute timer on my order window, what happens when it runs out?
faq.ques10: Do I need a wallet? How do I get one?
faq.ques11: How does your referral system work?
faq.ans1: <0>Tauschkrypto.de is an automated cryptocurrency exchange service. Our registered office address - Schützenstrasse 64, 23558 Lübeck, GERMANY.</0>
faq.ans2: <0>We allow you to exchange one cryptocurrency for another. To view our currently supported coins, please click on the coin selection widget in the top of fold of the page.</0><1>We will be adding more currencies very soon, stay tuned!</1><2>Missing your favorite coin? Let us know here: <1>support@tauschkrypto.de</1>.</2>
faq.ans3: <0>Our service fee is 0.5%. There are no hidden fees here: the amount you see on the screen is the exact amount you get in your wallet.</0>
faq.ans4: <0>Initiating a transaction doesn’t take more than a couple of minutes. The actual processing takes about 10–60 minutes before you receive your coins in your desired currency. The transaction time depends on the selected currencies and their respective blockchains.</0>
faq.ans5: <0><0><1>Enter</1> your <1>desired amount</1>, choose the currency type you <1>want to spend</1>, and the currency type you <1>want to buy</1> (e.g. if you want to spend 1 BTC to buy ETH at the exchange rate shown, you enter “1” and click on “GET STARTED”)<9></9></0><1><1>Enter your destination address</1> (e.g. if you are buying ETH, you enter your ETH wallet address)<3></3></1><2>You will be prompted to <1>send</1> your coins to a specified address.<5></5></2><3>Once we receive your coins, the processing of your order will start immediately.</3><4>Once everything is done, you will receive your ETH. Hurray! You just successfully exchanged your cryptocurrency.</4></0><1>Once you have paid for your order, it cannot be reversed. Please ensure that you have put in the right address.</1>
faq.ans6: <0>We do not collect or store any private information about you. The process is completely anonymous.</0>
faq.ans7: <0>We do not provide wallet hosting service at the moment. The exchange happens between two of your wallets:</0><1><0>The wallet you send the funds from (<1>spending</1> wallet)</0><1>The wallet you receive funds to (<1>receiving</1> wallet)</1></1><2>Once the transaction has been processed, you are in charge of your wallet balance security.</2>
faq.ans8: <0>Every order has a unique id like this:</0><1></1><2>Make sure you record your order id. We recommend bookmarking the page, you can always navigate to it later.</2><3>Once you have sent the cryptocurrency, losing connection, closing the tab or navigating elsewhere will not impact the transaction.</3><4>If you need help, feel free to contact us.</4>
faq.ans9: <0>There's a 15-minute window between the moment you open the order and the moment we detect the coins that you sent on the blockchain. During this time interval, we effectively freeze the price for your order.</0><1>If the 15 minute time window closes, the order is canceled because the price will have expired and will need to be recalculated.</1><2>If you did not send your funds in time, simply initiate a new order.</2><3>If you did send your funds, but for some reason they were not detected, contact us through the support chat and we will help you out.</3>
faq.ans10: <0>In order to use Tauschkrypto.de, you need to have your own wallet. The main upside of this feature is that we don’t hold your coins, and thus you retain full control over your assets at all times.</0><1>If you need some help obtaining a wallet for your desired cryptocurrency, please look here:</1><2><0>Bitcoin (BTC): <1>https://bitcoin.org/en/choose-your-wallet</1></0><1>Ethereum (ETH): <1>https://github.com/ethereum/mist/releases</1></1><2>Litecoin (LTC): <1>https://litecoin.org/</1></2></2><3>Please note that we are not affiliated with the websites mentioned above, these links are for user’s reference purposes only. We will not accept any liability, obligation or responsibility whatsoever for the content of external websites.</3>
faq.ans11: <0>Whenever you create an order, a referral code is automatically generated for you.</0><1>Current referral conditions are as follows: </1><2><0>Visit Tauschkrypto.de</0><1>Place an order with us</1><2>and You will receive an referral code on order page</2><3>If anyone places order through your referral link, you will be receive 50% of the fee to the withdraw address specified on this order!*</3></2><3>Referral shares are currently paid automatically to the wallet used in thetrade that had generated the referral code once the minimum quota of 0.01 BTC or equivalent is achieved.</3><4>E. g. if you exchange ETH for BTC, then you’ll receive a referral link that enables you to receive your accumulated referral shares in BTC.</4><5>It is possible to be paid out multiple times, in case your referral generates frequently (2 times or more) more than the minimum quota.</5><6>In case you want to know how much you earned this far, just text our support team and we’ll provide you with the information.</6><7>* These are subject to change at any time & We reserve the right to deny this offer on any grounds we see fit.</7>
faq.ans12: <0>A hardware wallet, also called a bitcoin locker or bitcoin safe, is the most secure bitcoin wallet. A hardware wallet is a device to be connected to your computer, using a USB or another kind of Hardware Walletconnection. Via this device you can run a bitcoin (or alt coin) wallet to securely store your bitcoins, and still send and receive them easily. A bitcoin hardware wallet will give you the safety of cold storage combined with the ease of an online wallet.</0><1>More information can be found here:</1><2><0>https://www.ledgerwallet.com/r/89d7?path=/videos/ledger-nano-s</0></2>

terms.2: Tauschkrypto.de is an Exchange which allows you to exchange crypto and fiat currencies with the best exchange rate. Terms “We”, “Exchange”, “Exchange operator” refer to Tauschkrypto.de.
terms.3: By using Tauschkrypto.de, you agree to these conditions. Please read them carefully. If you do not agree with the terms and conditions in this Agreement you may not use the Exchange.
terms.4: We reserve the right to make changes to our site, policies and terms of use at any time. The content of the pages of the website is for your general information and use only. It is subject to change without notice.
terms.5: Tauschkrypto.de is not responsible for any loss caused by any reason while working with the Exchange. Any kind of losses caused by the third party activities has to be handled by the user.
terms.6: Tauschkrypto.de takes an exchange fee for using the service. The fee is 0.5% of the transaction volume. The fee can be a subject to reasonable fluctuations due to the mathematical rounding.
terms.7: Transactions cannot be canceled by Tauschkrypto.de. Therefore, check your payment details before making transaction. Tauschkrypto.de is not responsible for your coins once they have been sent to the wallet.
terms.8: Tauschkrypto.de doesn’t guarantee the uptime of the exchange. Maintenance and downtime may be required at times.
terms.9: By uploading or sharing any kind of content, you automatically grant us a worldwide license to use your content. It becomes part of the public domain as long as it remains on our website. It can be used for marketing or any other purposes by Tauschkrypto.de.
terms.10: You are prohibited from using or accessing Tauschkrypto.de from the following jurisdictions
terms.11: Transactions from users in these jurisdictions are prohibited, and Tauschkrypto.de may seize any funds from users in these jurisdictions. By accessing this site or any services therein, you represent and warrant that you are not physically located in these prohibited jurisdictions.

bookmark.2: to add this page to your bookmarks. You can navigate back to this page at any time to check the status of your order.

order.blockchain: See your order details on blockchain
order.expired2: Your order is expired. You can make a new exchange order.
order.expired3: If you have already sent your coins, don’t worry. Once we get them, the status of the order will be updated retroactively.
order.failure2: There’s been a problem with your order. Please contact support to resolve at
order.error: Unknown order state, something went wrong
order.paid2: We are now preparing to release your coins
order.status11: In this step we are waiting for your deposit.
order.status21: Your order is on the blockchain, we are now waiting for the required number of confirmations before you can receive your funds.
order.status31: We got the funds and now have transferred our funds to you.
order.details: See your order details on our API
order.refund: Your order has been refunded. Please contact support in the live chat or at

tier.limit: Tier limits reached, additional verification needed
tier.explanation: This is a one-time process, once verified you’ll be able to complete future purchases instantly until current verification tier limits are reached.
tier.explanation2: This is a one-time process, once verified you’ll be able to complete future purchases for this withdrawal address instantly.
tier.selfieexplanation: i.e. you have to make a selfie of yourself with a provided credit card in your hands, identity card, plus a paper with today's date and 'Tauschkrypto.de'. You may hide middle digits of the credit card.
tier.w_selfieexplanation: i.e. you have to make a selfie of yourself with a provided credit card in your hands, identity card, plus a paper with today's date and 'Tauschkrypto.de'. You may hide middle digits of the credit card.

status.success: We will proceed to release your funds shortly
status.2: In order to fulfill your order we must get to know you better by getting a copy of your government issued ID and proof of residence. If we do not get these documents within 2 hours, we will refund the order.
status.4: We have received your government issued ID and proof of residence documents. Our team is now verifying them, keep checking this page for further information.
status.6: We have received your payment and our team has verified your identity and proof of residence documents. We will shortly release your funds and send you the payment.
status.7: This is a one-time process, once verified you’ll be able to complete future purchases instantly.
status.8: It seems that you have already completed the verification process.
status.9: We are now validating that your documents are still valid i.e. not expired, and that you have not exceeded the trading limit of your current verification tier.
status.10: In case we require any further documents from you, we will contact you via
status.11: In case you have any question feel free to contact us via the live chat or at
status.12: In this step we are waiting for your deposit.
status.14: We have received your funds and are now waiting for proof of residence and government issued ID verification.

kyc.11: e.g. color scanned passport, driving license, ID card. Shows date of birth, has expiration date.
kyc.21: A high-resolution photo/scan of a physical (non-digital: no screenshots, web pages or PDFs generated on the internet) utility bill from a known service provider, not older than 3 months old. Delivery address must be a fiscal, residence address (no PO boxes!).
kyc.22: Letters from the bank or credit card company delivered to a fiscal address (not a P.O. BOX) are also accepted.
kyc.6:
Help us reach you in case we need any further information from you.
This will also allow us to send you updates about your orders, your referrals, and occasional info about our product.
kyc.status2: ID and proof of residence have been rejected
kyc.status3: Government issued ID status updated to
kyc.status8: Something went wrong, please try resubmitting
kyc.statuscheck: Click here to get notified about your KYC status change

notify.noaccess: You do not have access to get notifications for this order.

referral.4: You will receive 50% of our revenues (0.25% of the turnover) of all of your referrals. This offer is currently not limited by time! For more details, and further assistance, please contact support via our Live chat!

refund.3: and it is the sole responsibility of the user to make sure that he controls the wallet the address of which he uses to receive funds from Tauschkrypto.de.
refund.4: Get in touch with us by chatting us or writing us an email at

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.p1: <0>This Privacy Policy explains how “YOA LTD.”, and its wholly owned subsidiaries (collectively, “YOA LTD.” we or us), collects, uses, discloses and protects your information. This policy applies to information we collect when you access or use “YOA LTD.” websites and mobile applications (collectively, Tauschkrypto.de services) or otherwise interact with us as described below. “YOA LTD.” provides the “YOA LTD.” Services through local operating entities that are wholly owned subsidiaries of “YOA LTD.” (each, a “YOA LTD.” Company). To determine which “YOA LTD.” Company collects your information and is responsible for processing your data.</0>
privacy.p2: <0>We may amend this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of this policy, and in some circumstances, we may provide you with additional notice, including, for example, by adding a statement to the homepage of the “YOA LTD.” Services or by sending you an email notification. We strongly encourage you to review the Privacy Policy whenever you access or use “YOA LTD.” Services to stay informed about our information practices and your privacy rights and choices.</0>
privacy.infoyou: <0>Information You Provide To Us.</0><1>We collect information you provide directly to us. For example, we collect information about you when you create an online account, complete a transaction, fill out a form, respond to surveys, post messages to our forums or wikis or otherwise communicate with us.</1><2>The types of information we may collect are as follows:</2><3><0>Contact information, such as your name, mailing address, telephone number, and email address. Financial information, such as bank account numbers, credit card numbers and virtual currency account information.</0><1>Government identification numbers, such as your social security number or a state-issued identification number.</1><2>Biographic or demographic information, such as your date of birth, gender, occupation, employment status and any other information you choose to provide about yourself.</2></3>
privacy.infosources: <0>Information We Collect From Other Sources</0><1>We may also obtain information from other sources and combine that with information we collect through the “YOA LTD.” Services. For example, we may collect nonpublic personal information about you from third parties, including identity verification services.</1>
privacy.infoauto: <0>Information We Collect Automatically</0><1>When you access or use the “YOA LTD.” Services, we automatically collect information as follows </1><2>Transaction information. we collect information about the transaction you complete via the “YOA LTD.” Services, including the amount of funds associated with a trade, the types of trades executed and other transaction information.</2><3>Location information. with your prior consent, we may collect precise geolocation information from your mobile device when you access or use our mobile applications. For more details, please see Your Choices below.</3><4>Device and Log information. we collect information about the computer or mobile device you use to access the “YOA LTD.” Services, including device identifiers, mobile network information, type of operating system, and the type of browser used. We also log information about your use of the “YOA LTD.” Services, including access times, pages viewed, IP address, other standard web log data, and the page visited before and after navigating to our websites.</4><5>Cookies and similar tracking technologies. we may use cookies, pixel tags, web beacons, and other tracking technologies to collect information about you when you interact with the “YOA LTD.” Services, including information about your browsing behaviour on our “YOA LTD.” Services. Cookies are small data files sent from our web servers to your computer or mobile device that enable us to, for example, capture how you arrived at the “YOA LTD.” Services, when you return, which pages on the “YOA LTD.” Services you visit, and to recognise that you are already logged on when we receive a page request from your browser.</5>
privacy.useinfo: <0>Use of information</0><1>We may use your information as follows </1><2><0>Provide the “YOA LTD.” services and customer support;</0><1>Process transactions and send notices about your transactions;</1><2>Manage your account(s) and send technical notices, updates, security alerts and support and administrative messages;</2><3>Resolve disputes, collect fees, and troubleshoot problems;</3><4>Prevent potentially prohibited or illegal activities and enforce our user agreements;</4><5>Personalize, measure and improve the “YOA LTD.” Services;</5><6>Deliver marketing and promotional offers on behalf of “YOA LTD.” and others, including via SMS, voice calls or email;</6><7>Link or combine your personal information with information we obtain from others to help understand your needs and provide you with better service;</7><8>Carry out any other purpose for which the information was collected, to the extent such purpose is necessarily contemplated by the collection of such information or as otherwise notified in the “YOA LTD.” Services at the time of collection.</8></2>
privacy.processinfo: <0>Processing of information</0><1>By accessing or using the “YOA LTD.” Services or otherwise providing information to us, you consent to the processing and transfer of information in and to the U.S. and other countries. Please refer to the U.S. – EU / Swiss Safe Harbor Compliance section below if you are a resident of the European Union or Switzerland.</1>
privacy.disclosure: <0>Disclosure of information </0><1>We may disclose any information we collect about you, whether you are a current or former customer, including nonpublic personal information and any other information we collect, to “YOA LTD.”, which processes information on behalf of all “YOA LTD.”, and with nonaffiliated third parties, which include non-financial companies, such as email service providers and fraud verification services, and others, such as other “YOA LTD.” users with which you engage in transactions. We may make such disclosures </1><2><0>To service providers that perform marketing services on our behalf; and</0><1>For our everyday business purposes, such as to process transactions, maintain accounts, respond to court orders and legal investigations or report to credit bureaus. For example, in connection with our everyday business purposes, we may share information about you as follows.</1><2><0>With any party you intend to distribute funds to, or that intends to distribute funds to you, via the “YOA LTD.” Services, including information about whether your account is active and whether the account has been verified.</0><1>With vendors, consultants and other service providers who need access to your information to carry out work on our behalf. These service providers help with our business operations such as fraud prevention and technology services.</1><2>When we believe, in our sole discretion, that the disclosure of your information is necessary to prevent physical harm or financial loss, to report suspected illegal activity, or to investigate violations of or enforce our user agreements or other policies and agreements.</2><3>In connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of “YOA LTD.” assets, financing or acquisition or all or a portion of our business to another company. With your consent or at your direction.</3><4>If we are under a duty to disclose or share your information to comply with our legal obligations. Other than in connection with a merger, sale of “YOA LTD.” assets, financing or acquisition, we will not sell or rent any of your information to third parties for their own marketing purposes.</4></2></2><3>Please note that third parties that support our customer identification and anti-fraud controls may retain and use information about you to perform services on our behalf and to improve their services. By using our Services, you consent to the retention and use of such information by these providers to improve their services.</3><4>We may also share aggregated or de-identified information with our affiliated companies or nonaffiliated third parties, which cannot reasonably be used to identify you.</4>
privacy.analytics: <0>Analytics services provided by others</0><1>We allow other entities to provide analytics services on our behalf. These entities may use cookies, web beacons and other tracking technologies to collect information about your use of the “YOA LTD.” Services, including your IP address, web browser, pages viewed, time spent on pages and links clicked. This information may be used by “YOA LTD.” to, among other things, analyze and track data, determine the popularity of certain content, and better understand your online activity.</1>
privacy.security: <0>Security</0><1>We implement reasonable security practices and procedures to help protect the confidentiality and security of your information, including any nonpublic personal information. We protect your information using reasonable physical, technical and administrative security measures, including by limiting access to your information to employees with a need to know such information. U.S. – EU / SWISS SAFE HARBOR COMPLIANCE</1><2>“YOA LTD.” complies with the U.S.-EU Safe Harbor Framework and the U.S.-Swiss Safe Harbor Framework as set forth by the U.S. Department of Commerce regarding the collection, use, and retention of personal information from European Union member countries and Switzerland. “YOA LTD.”has certified that it adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles of notice, choice, onward transfer, security, data integrity, access, and enforcement. To learn more about the Safe Harbor program, and to view “YOA LTD.” certification, please visit http //www.export.gov/safeharbor/</2><3>If you have a complaint regarding “YOA LTD.” compliance with the U.S.-EU Safe Harbor Framework or the U.S.-Swiss Safe Harbor Framework, first contact us through support at support@tauschkrypto.de. “YOA LTD.” has elected to use JAMS arbitration as an independent recourse mechanism available to settle unresolved complaints regarding “YOA LTD.” Safe Harbor commitments. Please refer to the section titled “Applicable Law; Arbitration” in our Terms of Service /en/articles/legal_privacy</3>
privacy.choices: <0>Your choices</0><1>Account Information: You may access and review or update your online account information at any time by logging into your account and viewing your profile. If you want to close your account, please contact us at support@tauschkrypto.de. However, please note that if you close your account, we may retain your information as required by law or for our legitimate business purposes, such as to collect fees owed, resolve disputes, troubleshoot problems, assist with any investigations, prevent fraud or enforce our user agreements.</1><2>Communications Preferences: You may opt out of receiving promotional communications from “YOA LTD.” by following the instructions in those communications. You may also opt out of receiving the Tauschkrypto.de newsletter or certain administrative emails by modifying your communications preferences through the settings feature of your online account. If you opt out of receiving promotional communications, we may still send you transactional or relationship messages, such as those about your account or our ongoing business relations.</2><3>Location: Our mobile applications may collect precise geolocation information from your mobile device with your prior consent. If you initially consent to our collection of location information, you may be able to subsequently stop the collection of this information through your device operating system settings. You may also stop our collection of location information by following the standard uninstall process to remove our mobile applications from your device.</3><4>Cookies: We use both session and persistent cookies. Session cookies expire when you log out of your account or close your browser. Persistent cookies remain on your computer or mobile device until you erase them or they otherwise expire. Most web browsers are set to accept cookies by default. You are free to decline most of our cookies if your browser or browser add-on permits, but choosing to remove or disable our cookies may interfere with your use and functionality of the “YOA LTD.” Services. Additionally, we may use certain persistent cookies that are not affected by your browser settings, but will use such cookies solely for identity verification and fraud prevention purposes. For more information about cookies and how to block, delete or disable them, please refer to your browser instructions, or contact us at support@tauschkrypto.de.</4>
privacy.optout: <0>Why cant I opt out of any sharing?</0><1>We do not engage in any sharing that would require us to provide you with an ability to opt out of such sharing. For instance, we do not share any information about you with third parties for their own marketing purposes.</1>
privacy.access: <0>Access to information</0><1>You have a right to access the information we hold about you. We may ask you to pay a fee before providing you with this information.</1>
privacy.contact: <0>Contact us</0><1>If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at <1>support@tauschkrypto.de</1>.</1>
